name: Tactics: Bludgeons Blessing
description: Attention! Sales of this game are suspended due to the loss of contacts with the Steam administration. Sales will be renewed after the access to this page from russia is closed. The program does not provide for russian localization and will no longer be sold to russia by the decision of the developer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows, Mac Processor: 2.66GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows, Mac Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection
